name: JumpStart Wildlife Safari: Field Trip
description:
Back of Jewel Case - PlayStation (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Take a Trip to the Wild Side!

Casey is lost among the wild animals and he's counting on you to find him. Watch out, there are lions, tigers and polar bears on the loose! Steer clear of coconuts and banana peels hurled by the mischievous monkeys. Make your way through 5 exciting adventures and you'll come home a hero!

Key Features:

  • Discover 5 adventure-packed environments
  • Conquer 15 levels of wild game play!
  • Practice beginning math, reading preparation, music, and problem-solving skills!
  • Family Play feature lets two people play at the same time!
